verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,

Is it for thy <S%H3374>fear<s%> of him that he <S%H3198>reproveth<s%> <S%H935>thee<s%>, That he entereth with thee into <S%H4941>judgment<s%>?
Is not thy <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%>? Neither is there any <S%H7093>end<s%> to thine <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>.
For thou hast taken <S%H2254>pledges<s%> of thy <S%H251>brother<s%> for <S%H2600>nought<s%>, And <S%H6584>stripped<s%> the <S%H6174>naked<s%> of their <S%H899>clothing<s%>.

But as for the <S%H2220>mighty<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, he had the <S%H776>earth<s%>; And the honorable <S%H5375>man<s%>, he dwelt in <S%H3427>it<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H490>widows<s%> away <S%H7387>empty<s%>, And the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> have been <S%H1792>broken<s%>.

Or <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, so that thou canst not <S%H7200>see<s%>, And <S%H8229>abundance<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> cover <S%H3680>thee<s%>.
Is not <S%H433>God<s%> in the <S%H1363>height<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>? And <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H7218>height<s%> of the <S%H3556>stars<s%>, how high they <S%H7311>are<s%>!
And thou <S%H559>sayest<s%>, What doth <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%>? Can he <S%H8199>judge<s%> through the thick <S%H6205>darkness<s%>?
Thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%> are a <S%H5643>covering<s%> to <S%H7200>him<s%>, so that he seeth <S%H1980>not<s%>; And he walketh on the <S%H2329>vault<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.
Wilt thou <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H734>way<s%> Which <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H4962>men<s%> have <S%H1869>trodden<s%>?
Who were snatched <S%H7059>away<s%> before their <S%H6256>time<s%>, Whose <S%H3247>foundation<s%> was <S%H3332>poured<s%> out as a <S%H5104>stream<s%>,
Who <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H410>God<s%>, <S%H5493>Depart<s%> from <S%H7706>us<s%>; And, What can the Almighty do for <S%H6466>us<s%>?
Yet he <S%H4390>filled<s%> their <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H6098>things<s%>: But the counsel of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is far from <S%H7368>me<s%>.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H8055>it<s%>, and are glad; And the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> laugh them to <S%H3932>scorn<s%>,
Saying <S%H518><s%>, Surely they that did rise up <S%H7009>against<s%> us are cut <S%H3582>off<s%>, And the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of them the <S%H784>fire<s%> hath <S%H398>consumed<s%>.
Acquaint <S%H5532><s%> now thyself with <S%H7999>him<s%>, and be at peace: Thereby <S%H2896>good<s%> shall come unto <S%H935>thee<s%>.
Receive <S%H3947><s%>, I pray <S%H8451>thee<s%>, the law from his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, And lay <S%H7760>up<s%> his <S%H561>words<s%> in thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>.
If thou <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>, thou shalt be built <S%H1129>up<s%>, If thou put <S%H7368>away<s%> <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from thy <S%H168>tents<s%>.
And <S%H7896>lay<s%> thou thy <S%H1220>treasure<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%>, And the gold of <S%H211>Ophir<s%> among the <S%H6697>stones<s%> of the <S%H5158>brooks<s%>;
And the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> will be thy <S%H1220>treasure<s%>, And <S%H8443>precious<s%> silver unto <S%H3701>thee<s%>.
For then shalt thou <S%H6026>delight<s%> thyself in the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>, And shalt lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> unto <S%H433>God<s%>.
Thou shalt make thy <S%H6279>prayer<s%> unto <S%H8085>him<s%>, and he will hear <S%H7999>thee<s%>; And thou shalt pay thy <S%H5088>vows<s%>.
Thou shalt also <S%H1504>decree<s%> a <S%H562>thing<s%>, and it shall be <S%H6965>established<s%> unto <S%H216>thee<s%>; And light shall <S%H5050>shine<s%> upon thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
When they cast thee <S%H8213>down<s%>, thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%>, There is lifting <S%H1466>up<s%>; And the <S%H7807>humble<s%> <S%H5869>person<s%> he will <S%H3467>save<s%>.
He will <S%H4422>deliver<s%> even <S%H336>him<s%> that is not <S%H5355>innocent<s%>: <S%H4422>Yea<s%>, he shall be delivered through the <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> of thy <S%H3709>hands<s%>.
